item.title: Naming Rule
item.description: Naming .psd file anad layers in documents Project and file names Avoid long names for your projects and files and, DO NOT use characters like +-<>%,#;!. Layer names Before you start adding buttons and animations, follow the rules below. It is much easier to add interactivity with finalized names rather than to edit all of them afterward. Basic rules include: Only user Western characters are allowed for layer names. DO NOT use characters such as + - <> %,#;!
